excerpt: "RowBotAI, a conversational AI telephony startup co-founded by Ken Kalb, Jan Drake, and Julian Kalb, was launched yesterday. RowBotAI is on a mission to revolutionize the way businesses communicate with their customers by providing personalized voice and text chatbots that accurately understand and meet their needs."
